subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The “Let’s go Yankees!” chants started more than 20 minutes before the first pitch tossed by the Angels’ Jered Weaver nearly 3,000 miles away.
snippet: The “Let’s go Yankees!” chants started more than 20 minutes before the first pitch tossed by the Angels’ Jered Weaver nearly 3,000 miles away.
